title: Toh Lagi Sharat
plot: A bet between two friends turns so ugly giving rise to vengeance and deception where every one of them revolving around the incident is pulled in the spider's web, making every one of them a suspect and everyone has a reason to kill.

A simple bet between two friends, that soon turns ugly giving rise to vengeance and deception were all of them revolving around the incident is pulled in the spider's web, making every one of them a suspect and giving them a reason to kill.

A simple bet of pulling pranks between two childhood friends on college's start turns so dark and ugly that soon life becomes just a tool and priceless just to fill the pride and honor. Vengeance gives rise to traps and deception where all the characters revolving around the incident are involuntarily engulfed in spider's web like some dark burrow's web which will pull In all the preys inside his trap. Will the innocent be eaten in this twisting and mastermind traps or will be the spider who gets trapped inside? Are you ready for the spider twisting roller-coaster tale of traps and deception where everyone is a suspect and every one of them has a reason to kill? Then solve this Murder mystery in your nearby cinemas on 1st June 2018.::Nitin Vaidya
